title: palukavathEla
sahitya:
palukavatEla paramAtma I vELa


anupallavi

palumAru padayugamunu vadalaka nE vimpu kaNDDaka

caraNam

 karuNA sAgara nannu kanikaramutO gAduvanuka 
sharaNU jocci nI nAmamu smariyimpu cunuNDaganu 
varamulosagi vEgamE nA vesaTalanu tIrtuvanuka 
varada gOpAla dAsavaruni tOnu okamATa
